description: Hackney Marshes is of London wide importance. Common land on the front line against urban pressure on green space and rivers. Led by Hackney Marshes Users Group who have for many years organised locally to defend and improve the Marshes

events.name: Hackney Marshes Walk
events.notes: Visitors can arrive at any time during the opening hours.There may be queues at busy times.

factsheet.heading: Description
paragraphs: Worth noting is the Olympic -related building and volunteer conservation work. They have both transformed the face of the marshes in recent years.
The river Lea still runs in its natural banks, both a little known natural treasure and the focus of community concern about sewage pollution.

location.address: Hackney Marshes Centre, off Homerton Road, E9 5PE

name: Hackney Marshes Walk
